Title: Manas Mhasakar | Personal Webpage
Name: Manas Mhasakar
Description: A Computer Science undergrad from BITS Pilani. Passionate about Space Technology, Cognitive Modelling and Open Source.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I am also interested in competitive programming and regularly practice on getting better at it.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m probably gaming, watching football or studying for an exam
I love to write and contribute to football blogs, cycle, or go off on a hike :)
WorkContent: I am currently full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat  de Barcelona

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
